statement:
trgcgrg.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
trgcgrg.m $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
trgcgrg.r $e |- .~ = ( cgrG ` G ) $.

trgcgrg.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
trgcgrg.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
trgcgrg.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
trgcgrg.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.

trgcgr.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( A .- B ) = ( D .- E ) ) $.
trgcgr.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( B .- C ) = ( E .- F ) ) $.
trgcgr.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( C .- A ) = ( F .- D ) ) $.
trgcgr $p |- ( ph -> <" A B C "> .~ <" D E F "> ) $.
